arm_group.description: Patient who have received a robotically guided isolated patellofemoral implant.

brief_summary.textblock:
The purpose of the study is to determine the survivorship rate of robotically  guided
      isolated patellofemoral implants at 2, 5 and 10 year postoperative.

clinical_study.brief_title: Survivorship and Outcomes of Robotically Assisted Patellofemoral UKA

detailed_description.textblock:
The purpose of the study is to determine the survivorship rate of robotically  guided
      isolated patellofemoral implants at 2, 5 and 10 year postoperative.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:

          -  Over 21 years of age underwent primary robotically guided UKA and received an
             isolated patellofemoral implant at least 24 months post operative as of February 2013

        Exclusion Criteria:

          -  Patient will be excluded from participation in the study if they are cognitively
             unable to answer study questions.

study_pop.textblock:
Patients who underwent a primary robotically guided UKA and received an isolated
        patellofemoral implant.

intervention.description: A robot guided isolated patellofemoral unicompartmental knee arthroplasty procedures to replace only the patellofemoral component of the knee.
intervention.intervention_name: Robotically guided patellofemoral UKA isolated patellofemoral implants

facility.name: St. Helena Hospital Coon Joint Replacement Institute

clinical_study.official_title: Survivorship and Outcomes of Robotically Assisted Patellofemoral UKA

overall_official.affiliation: St. Helena Hospital Coon Joint Replacement

primary_outcome.description: 10 year survivorship of robotically guided isolated patellofemoral implants at 2,5, and 10 year follow up.
primary_outcome.measure: 10 year survivorship of robotically guided isolated patellofemoral implants.

required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on June 04, 2014
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

secondary_outcome.description: The survivorship rate of robotically guided isolated patellofemoral implants at 2,5, and 10 year.
secondary_outcome.measure: 2 year survivorship of robotically guided isolated patellofemoral implants.

secondary_outcome.description: The survivorship rate of robotically guided isolated patellofemoral implants at 2,5, and 10 years post operative.
secondary_outcome.measure: 5 year survivorship of robotically guided isolated patellofemoral implants.

clinical_study.study_design: Observational Model: Case-Only, Time Perspective: Retrospective
